fields.name: drum
fields.review_text: Received my Drumkit 2 days earlier than expected. Really can't speak more highly of Drum Loot, great prices, the support is fantastic and no issues with delivery what so ever. My main store for drum stuff now!

fields.name: drum
fields.review_text: I buy all my drum equipment from here. Best prices around. Thanks to all the team at Drum Loot!

fields.name: drum
fields.review_text: Loving my new drumset but my only issue was delivery was a bit delayed. These things happen but I wanted my drums faster! Look how amazing they are.

fields.name: drum
fields.review_text: I buy all my drum accessories here, they have the highest quality products and the best prices.

fields.name: drum
fields.review_text: I made a large order with Drum Loot but various products from my order never arrived. After a lot of back and forth they eventually provided me a refund for the missing products.
